colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I TSOGS KYI MCHOD PA JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL BDE CHEN SNYING PO RAB RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DU GYUR BA'I DAM PA CHEN PO MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS TSUL LA MKHAS PA'I RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU YANGS SHING RTOGS PA'I YON TAN GYIS NYE BAR PHYUG PA LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHES BSKUL BA MDZAD PA'I NGOR GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE'I TSIG 'DON RNAMS ZAB CING RGYA CHE LA RANG NYID BLO GROS KYI MTHU DMAN PAS JI LTA BA BZHIN DBYI BAR DKA' YANG, SDOM 'BYUNG RTZA 'GREL, GSANG BA SPYI'I CHO GA SNYING PO RGYAN DANG, DAM TSIG LNGA PA, dOMBHI HE RU KAS MDZAD PA SOGS RGYA GZHUNG DANG, BU STON RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA SOGS KUNGS THUB KYI TSOGS MCHOD DU MA LA LEGS PAR GZHIR ZHAG TE GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS PHO BRANG PO TA LAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI ZHA LU MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG YON TAN 'BYUNG GNAS SO,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
